body: Some half-elves born of drow parents exhibit more drow traits than others—particularly many of the physical features of the drow—and have darkvision 60 feet and light blindness. This racial trait replaces the low-light vision racial trait.
name: Drow-Blooded
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Half-Elves/Alternate Racial Rules/Alternate Racial Traits/Drow-Blooded
